title: Wumpus World

title: Snake
desc: In this game, the main objective of the player is to catch the maximum number of fruits without hitting the wall or itself.

title: Whack a Mole
desc: Whac-A-Mole is an arcade game that was created in 1975 by the Japanese amusements manufacturer TOGO.
